issue.title: [Java][Release] Java post-release tests fail due to missing testing data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Download the testing repositories when deploying to apache maven repository during the java post-release task.
